item.title: Project Manager for Digitalization & Process Optimization in Production (m/f/d)
item.description:
We are currently looking for a Project Manager for Digitalization & Process Optimization in Production (m/f/d) to support the team of one of our important customers. The position is a permanent position.

Tasks

  • Identification and analysis of potential for process optimization, digitalization, and automation in production
  • Planning, coordination, and implementation of digitalization and automation projects: from requirements analysis to successful implementation
  • Support in optimizing existing systems and introducing new systems (including BDE, MES, PPS, ERP) to increase productivity, quality, and resource efficiency
  • Evaluation and use of technologies, e.g., robotics, cobots, AI-based solutions
  • Change management: support in implementing changes and introducing new systems
  • Process documentation
  • Interface between the individual departments, e.g., production departments, IT and digitalization, as well as external partners
  • Participation in the digitalization strategy and the continuous development of digitalization and automation in production

Your Profile

  • Degree in a technical field, e.g., industrial engineering, mechanical engineering, production engineering, or similar
  • Several years of experience in a production environment with a focus on digitalization or process optimization
  • In-depth knowledge of production processes, lean production, robotics, and Industry 4.0
  • Experience in project management
  • Strong implementation skills and initiative
  • Strong communication skills and change management expertise: enjoy change, driving it forward and convincing colleagues
  • Basic knowledge of AI-based tools, interest in new technologies and independent further development in these areas
  • Fluency in German is essential

Benefits

  • Varied and responsible role with opportunities to shape the future
  • Perfect work-life balance thanks to a 35-hour week, flexible working hours, and 30 days of vacation
  • Team-oriented working atmosphere
  • Security, prospects, and appreciation
  • Flat hierarchies and short decision-making processes
  • Attractive performance-related remuneration and a wide range of additional benefits, such as a company bicycle

General conditions

  • Start date: Immediately
  • Location: 67547 Worms

item.title: Senior Java FullStack Developer (m/w/d)
item.description:
At uRemoTech, we develop modern software solutions for demanding customers. We are looking for an experienced Java FullStack Developer (m/f/d) who is just as comfortable with backend as frontend development—and who not only implements software, but also actively helps to shape it.

If you enjoy clean architecture, modern frameworks, and pragmatic solutions, and like to take on responsibility, then you’ve come to the right place.

About uRemoTech

uRemoTech is a 100% remote IT consulting company based near Kiel in Schleswig-Holstein. We support companies throughout Germany in implementing modern infrastructure, cloud, and software solutions. In recent years, we have successfully implemented projects for well-known customers such as Daimler, the DFB, and E.ON.

Your tasks

  • Development of modern front-end and back-end solutions in an agile environment.
  • Collaboration with other consultants and developers to find the best solutions.
  • Familiarization with new technologies and continuous expansion of your knowledge.

What you bring to the table

  • At least 10 years of professional experience in software development.
  • Backend experience with Java or Kotlin and a Java framework (e.g., Spring, Quarkus).
  • Frontend experience with at least one common framework: React, Angular, or Vue.
  • Team player, problem-solving skills, independence
  • Very good German and good English skills.
  • Good communication skills and customer focus.
  • Flexibility for remote work and occasional on-site appointments.

What we offer

  • Permanent full-time contract.
  • 100% remote work with flexible hours.
  • Varied projects with well-known customers
  • Active promotion of further education, training, and conferences
  • Modern hardware (MacBook)
  • Attractive salary depending on experience
  • 30 days of vacation
  • Additional benefits such as JobRad, gym subsidy, and Deutschlandticket
